name: Stroke Care
description: They are dedicated to providing quality stroke care and improving the health of our patients and community. Chinese Hospital is recognized and certified by The Joint Commission as a Primary Stroke Center. Their highly trained team includes a rapid-response team, emergency physicians, neurologists, and experienced nurses, who have extensive stroke training with the tools and expertise necessary to provide critical, life-saving care.
